description: ​Connect with the Filecoin community in Istanbul and learn about the latest advancements from across the ecosystem from the Filecoin Foundation and Protocol Labs team. From AI and data provenance to the latest on FVM, join us Tuesday, November 14, starting at 9:00 AM.
location: Asuka Ballroom at the Swissôtel The Bosphorus Istanbul

sessions.name: Mastering phase 2 - Accelerating data onboarding
sessions.description:
Speaker: Clara Tsao, Filecoin Foundation

Description: Learn about the tools and user demand generation that the data onboarding team is contributing to support phase 2. Join the kick-off session to understand how they are helping in onboarding high-quality datasets to the network. Discover ways in which you can contribute by creating solutions and driving new revenue streams with these tools.

sessions.name: Filecoin's Labweek Launches
sessions.description:
Speaker: Molly Mackinlay, Protocol Labs

Description: Overview of the epic launches across the Fileocin network this week, and what's coming in 2024 to build momentum toward

sessions.name: DeStor REST API for Filecoin
sessions.description:
Speaker: Will Scott, Protocol Labs 

Description: Historically, onboarding data to the Filecoin network been challenging for Independent Software Vendors (ISVs). DeStor REST API for Filecoin addresses this challenge by providing a user-friendly API to streamline the data onboarding process,  facilitating a simpler integration for ISVs looking to offer Filecoin as storage solution to their clients. In this talk, we will delve into what DeStor REST API is, introduce the simple DRAFF Blob API, and discuss how popular block storage APIs like AWS S3 can be constructed using it as a foundation.

sessions.name: Standardizing & Measuring Retrievability
sessions.description:
Speaker: Will Scott, Protocol Labs 

Description: Talk about retrievability.

sessions.name: Data onboarding tooling (Spade and Singularity v2)
sessions.description:
Speaker: Caroline Cai, Protocol Labs 

Description: In this enlightening session on Singularity V2, participants will discover its groundbreaking features that not only surpass its predecessor, V1—a tool responsible for almost 20% of data onboarding to Filecoin—but also streamline the data storage process. Delve into its expansive compatibility, supporting over 40 storage solutions from local drives to S3-like cloud services. Explore its space-saving inline preparation, versatile deal-making in both push and pull modes, and an intuitive admin dashboard for effortless dataset management and deal tracking. Join us to revolutionize your data storage and management capabilities with Singularity V2. 
Spade is a data onboarding platform that matches storage clients to storage providers and allows clients to specify how they want their data stored. In this session, learn about Spade features and improvements.

sessions.name: Layer Zero to Layer Two: ZkAmeoba
sessions.description: Description: Filecoin's First Layer 2 Solution that will unlock filecoin in Gaming, NFT and many other applications.

sessions.name: DSA Enterprise Architecture WG
sessions.description:
Speaker: Ashwanth Samuel, Protocol Labs

Description: The Decentralized Storage Alliance (DSA) brings together technology industry leaders to help enterprises make the transition to decentralized storage technologies through education, advocacy, and best practices. In this session, learn about the DSA's latest Sealing Optimization Release and upcoming reference architectures for the ecosystem.

sessions.name: Filecoin CDN Networks: Saturn & Titan
sessions.description:
Speaker: Jenks Guo, Filecoin Foundation 

Description: Decentralized storage has a solution for retrieval too. Saturn and Titan project are two flagship solutions for retrival solution and accelration of the content on Filecoin network. This also build potential real revenue stream for SPs also validates the business by brining usage to the data stored on Filecoin.
